meanings.definition: A short account of a particular incident or event.
meanings.sent1: She shared an anecdote about her trip to the zoo.
meanings.sent2: The book is full of interesting anecdotes about famous people.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa always tells the same anecdote about his childhood pet.
meanings.sent4: Her anecdote about getting lost in the city was both funny and relatable.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used an anecdote to explain the concept of gravity.

meanings.sent1: The comedian started his set with a hilarious anecdote.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to my grandma's anecdotes from when she was young.
meanings.sent3: The anecdote about the clumsy waiter made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His life was like an anecdote from a fairy tale.
meanings.sent5: The movie began with an anecdote that set the tone for the entire film.
